headline.main: The War in Africa and Its Historical Background; WAR IN THE DESERT THE BATTLE FOR AFRICA. By Raoul Aghon xvii+300 pp. New York: Henry Holt Company $2.75

lead_paragraph: BECAUSE of the role the southern and eastern shores of the Mediterranean play in the current war the volume of Mr. Raoul Aglion, a former attache of the French Legation at Cairo and a student of the Near East, offers reading which is as informative as it is interesting: and the book's interest is twofold.
abstract: Aglion, Raoul; War in the Desert
